description: A special drug invented by Tony Tony Chopper that distorts the wavelengths of Devil Fruit transformation abilities. For Chopper's Hito Hito no Mi, it allows him to access seven transformation points instead of the normal three. However, consuming multiple Rumble Balls within six hours has dangerous side effects.
creator: Tony Tony Chopper

keyMoments.title: Chopper Prepares to Use Rumble Ball
keyMoments.description: Facing Kumadori's overwhelming Seimei Kikan technique and Tekkai defense, Chopper prepares to consume a Rumble Ball to transform and match his opponent's power.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows Chopper's dangerous escalation to Monster Point by consuming multiple Rumble Balls in the next episode.

abilities: Grants Chopper access to additional transformation forms
Allows transformation into specialized combat forms
Dangerous side effects if multiple consumed within 6 hours
